10.1109/SmartCity.2015.122.title: Variations of Social Psychology of Russian Society in Last 100 Years
10.1109/SmartCity.2015.122.author: Solovyev, V.D. and Bochkarev, V.V. and Kaveeva, A.D.
10.1109/SmartCity.2015.122.paperMotivationText: Variation of values, behaviour, culture and psychology were investigated for other countries/cultures.
10.1109/SmartCity.2015.122.paperContributionText: The authors analyze the frequency of selected words in Russian Google N-grams over a large time span in order to understand their relationship with socio-demographic parameters.
10.1109/SmartCity.2015.122.paperResultsText: Correlations of socio-demographic parameters and values of society (measured through word frequencies) are similar for Russian texts and other societies (American, Chinese) from the literature.
